short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes legal text to give you a better understanding of what you are agreeing to online. Built by Width.Ai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using generative AI, the Legal Text Summarizer extension generates a summary of key points from legal text and a list of any particular points that should be paid special attention to. Use this extension to create a better understanding of what you are agreeing to online.
